name: Mad Dash (stephanedurette)
description:
Rules

Theme: Rush!

Restriction: Tell a story without words

Controls

WASD to move, Left Click to attack

Click on the screen for the game to go full-screen

Credits

Art by Kenney, find him at: https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Music by GWriterStudio, find them at:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-album-051321-196147

Other

Thank you to Mini Jam for hosting this competition every other week!

Please leave your feedback after playing, all feedback / suggestions are appreciated!

Thank you!
